name: Then, we march.
description:
ᴍᴀʀᴄʜ

ʟɪꜱᴛᴇɴ

ᴍᴀʀᴄʜ

ᴍᴀʀᴄʜɪɴɢ ꜰᴇᴇʟꜱ ᴇɴᴅʟᴇꜱꜱ

ʀᴇꜱᴛ

ᴀɴᴅ ᴅʀᴇᴀᴍ

ᴛᴀᴋᴇ ᴀ ᴅᴇᴇᴩ ʙʀᴇᴀᴛʜ

ᴀɴᴅ ᴍᴀʀᴄʜ

Audio and design by Maize Wallin

Programming, and technical art by Thomas Ingram

Currently unfinished - have yet to implement text and audio

Each scene lasts for 30 seconds.

Thank you to the following, for the use of your tools and assets:
